blog.description: ☆ Welcome to BNHA Source!  We are a fansite dedicated to the animanga Boku No Hero Academia created by Kōhei Horikoshi. Here you will find artworks and edits of the anime and manga, along with news updates. We track the tag #bnhasource and #bnhaedit. ♥

blog.name: linnyhuman
blog.title: Im a person
blog.description: Homosapien: A creature known as a human. The one here happens to be obsessed with anime.

title: Writers Block
body: Hey! I’m a fanfic writer and have been having some serious writers block. I really need some outside help figuring out what to do next. I am open to any suggestions anyone might have!

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: Down to Earth
description:
by iliketoyeetityeetit3

In a world where people get powers called quirks, a world where people can be villains or heroes. In this world aliens actually exist and one of them has come to visit. A certain Hero has to deal with said alien. What will happen? Will we ever know? yes. yes you will just read it to find out.

or the one fic where Izuku is an alien and visits earth for an extended amount of time. He also meets Eraserhead.

Words: 100, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Multi

blog.name: audiblehush
blog.title: The Lord put us here to punch holes in the sky
blog.description: 29. Teacher. Equestrian. Dancer. Video Game Enthusiast. Avid Reader. I'm fond of masked vigilantes with a penchant for sleuthing.

body:
Writing again

Started writing fanfic again after over a decade of not writing creatively, thanks to the encouragement of a friend. I read fic all the time, but haven’t written any since high school. It’s kind of scary? But it’s also freeing to allow myself to suck at it as I get my feet wet again. Nothing ventured, nothing gained, right?

Surprisingly enough, it’s in the My Hero Academia fandom for my favorite ship. WHO KNEW??

blog.name: heightsallianceserver
blog.title: Heights Alliance
blog.description: Welcome to Heights Alliance! We're a canon and OC friendly My Hero Academia roleplaying server seeking active 16+ members!

summary: Stay at Heights Alliance! Heights Alliance is a canon and OC friendly, Discord-based, paragraph roleplay group accepting members...
body:
Stay at Heights Alliance!

Heights Alliance is a canon and OC friendly, Discord-based, paragraph roleplay group accepting members who are 16+. With multiple modes for character interactions (including group chats and direct messages), ours is an active and welcoming group always looking for new members! To learn more about the server, head over to our rules!

About | Rules | Characters

blog.name: the-reader-to-my-hero
blog.title: BNHA x OC
blog.description: A sad art college student who enjoys reading cute headcanons and sometimes draws them! I always ask permission and credit the original Writer. I'm the creator of Amin Kanasu, Biohazard, and Olive. If ya wanna see my art use the tag #my art

body:
League of Villains Timeline

Yo whats up gamers, I got a big favor to ask of you guys;

May somebody up to date with the manga have or make a timeline of what the League has done? The raid on the training camp is obviously in the summer, but I’m not very familiar with the Overhaul arc or when it takes place.

I ask for such a big favor because Im lazy writing a fic that depends on when things happen


Thank you all so much in advance!!

blog.name: asktogatadad
blog.title: Ask_TogataDad
blog.description: Greetings! I am Togata Setsuna, single dad of lovely son named Mirio. I love telling my story so be the guest to ask questions!

summary: Hey LRC mirio, any thoughts on toga himiko?
question: Hey LRC mirio, any thoughts on toga himiko?
answer:
LRC Mirio: …..Alright. Another perfect score. I should keep this up until the next exam.

??: Hiiiii… So you must be Togata-kun, huh?

LRC Mirio: ? Who are…

??: Oh, don’t look back on me. I might KILL everyone in this cafe♡.

LRC Mirio: ……!?

Who… What are you!

??: Shhhh… Don’t be so loud. People might hear our delightful conversation. Now, let’s just sit still and chat, shall we?

LRC Mirio: …..What do you want?

??: You see, Togata-kun. My name is Toga Himiko of League of Villain. And we are looking for strong recruits to join us at the moment.

I observed you for a while and you were pretty incredible! Prefect in Shiketsu High, academic grades are at top notch, you even fight soooo well♡. You are worthy of our team. What do you say?

LRC Mirio: ….Ridiculous. Do you think you are making any senses here?

Toga: Of course I knew you wouldn’t accept the offer in the first try… But how ‘bout if I put it this way?

I know the likes of you veeeeery well, Togata-kun. I was the exact person like you. Forced to follow stereotyped life… What they call 'normal’… Aren’t I right? You had to follow the path of 'hero’ just because your 'father’ happens to be one. That is sooo boring. Isn’t it about the time you outgrow that and find a true path you wish to walk? I can guarantee, it would be sooo cool♡. Come, let’s shake hands and revenge the people who fiddled with our lives.

LRC Mirio: *Sneer* How hilarious. I’ve heard of the League of Villain before but never thought they were this much of lunatics.

The way you talk as if you know everything about me is disgusting. What exactly do you know about me to spit those comments on me like that?

About that absurd offer you gave me? I can say nothing but “You completely missed the target.” Why are you saying my life is miserable? I am simply following the path of my father because it is the EXACT path I want to go. Nobody forced me. 

It is my OWN decision to follow my sun. Too bad you don’t have a mentor of your own life. But beat it and don’t you ever come back for a second offer. I’m never going to buy any of it if they are from villains! Oh, Just you wait… 

I WILL BECOME THE GREATEST HERO AND ARREST EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU!!

Toga: Tee hee hee… Oooooh, scary! Too bad! Hoped we could get along… Oh well, then I will be going! Don’t even try to turn back until you hear me going out of the cafe. Otherwise, everyone here is as good as DEAD!♡

_________________________________

LRC Mirio: After the mysterious girl left the cafe, I called the police to search the areas to look for her. But she was nowhere to be found.

My father came, half freaked out. He was scared to death thinking something bad might happened to me. He said he was sorry over and over again.

I was disappointed at myself, failing to catch the villain only a few inches away. But on the other hand, I was just glad no one was hurt despite a real villain was there.

Oh, by the way… I didn’t answer the question yet, right?
One word would describe her.

“Psycho”.

LRC Mirio: …..What do you want?

??: You see, Togata-kun. My name is Toga Himiko of League of Villain. And we are looking for strong recruits to join us at the moment.

I observed you for a while and you were pretty incredible! Prefect in Shiketsu High, academic grades are at top notch, you even fight soooo well♡. You are worthy of our team. What do you say?

LRC Mirio: ….Ridiculous. Do you think you are making any senses here?

Toga: Of course I knew you wouldn’t accept the offer in the first try… But how ‘bout if I put it this way?

I know the likes of you veeeeery well, Togata-kun. I was the exact person like you. Forced to follow stereotyped life… What they call 'normal’… Aren’t I right? You had to follow the path of 'hero’ just because your 'father’ happens to be one. That is sooo boring. Isn’t it about the time you outgrow that and find a true path you wish to walk? I can guarantee, it would be sooo cool♡. Come, let’s shake hands and revenge the people who fiddled with our lives.

LRC Mirio: *Sneer* How hilarious. I’ve heard of the League of Villain before but never thought they were this much of lunatics.

The way you talk as if you know everything about me is disgusting. What exactly do you know about me to spit those comments on me like that?

About that absurd offer you gave me? I can say nothing but “You completely missed the target.” Why are you saying my life is miserable? I am simply following the path of my father because it is the EXACT path I want to go. Nobody forced me. 

It is my OWN decision to follow my sun. Too bad you don’t have a mentor of your own life. But beat it and don’t you ever come back for a second offer. I’m never going to buy any of it if they are from villains! Oh, Just you wait… 

I WILL BECOME THE GREATEST HERO AND ARREST EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU!!

Toga: Tee hee hee… Oooooh, scary! Too bad! Hoped we could get along… Oh well, then I will be going! Don’t even try to turn back until you hear me going out of the cafe. Otherwise, everyone here is as good as DEAD!♡

_________________________________

LRC Mirio: After the mysterious girl left the cafe, I called the police to search the areas to look for her. But she was nowhere to be found.

My father came, half freaked out. He was scared to death thinking something bad might happened to me. He said he was sorry over and over again.

I was disappointed at myself, failing to catch the villain only a few inches away. But on the other hand, I was just glad no one was hurt despite a real villain was there.

Oh, by the way… I didn’t answer the question yet, right?
One word would describe her.

“Psycho”.
trail.content:
LRC Mirio: …..Alright. Another perfect score. I should keep this up until the next exam.

??: Hiiiii… So you must be Togata-kun, huh?

LRC Mirio: ? Who are…

??: Oh, don’t look back on me. I might KILL everyone in this cafe♡.

LRC Mirio: ……!?

Who… What are you!

??: Shhhh… Don’t be so loud. People might hear our delightful conversation. Now, let’s just sit still and chat, shall we?

LRC Mirio: …..What do you want?

??: You see, Togata-kun. My name is Toga Himiko of League of Villain. And we are looking for strong recruits to join us at the moment.

I observed you for a while and you were pretty incredible! Prefect in Shiketsu High, academic grades are at top notch, you even fight soooo well♡. You are worthy of our team. What do you say?

LRC Mirio: ….Ridiculous. Do you think you are making any senses here?

Toga: Of course I knew you wouldn’t accept the offer in the first try… But how ‘bout if I put it this way?

I know the likes of you veeeeery well, Togata-kun. I was the exact person like you. Forced to follow stereotyped life… What they call 'normal’… Aren’t I right? You had to follow the path of 'hero’ just because your 'father’ happens to be one. That is sooo boring. Isn’t it about the time you outgrow that and find a true path you wish to walk? I can guarantee, it would be sooo cool♡. Come, let’s shake hands and revenge the people who fiddled with our lives.

LRC Mirio: *Sneer* How hilarious. I’ve heard of the League of Villain before but never thought they were this much of lunatics.

The way you talk as if you know everything about me is disgusting. What exactly do you know about me to spit those comments on me like that?

About that absurd offer you gave me? I can say nothing but “You completely missed the target.” Why are you saying my life is miserable? I am simply following the path of my father because it is the EXACT path I want to go. Nobody forced me. 

It is my OWN decision to follow my sun. Too bad you don’t have a mentor of your own life. But beat it and don’t you ever come back for a second offer. I’m never going to buy any of it if they are from villains! Oh, Just you wait… 

I WILL BECOME THE GREATEST HERO AND ARREST EACH AND EVERY ONE OF YOU!!

Toga: Tee hee hee… Oooooh, scary! Too bad! Hoped we could get along… Oh well, then I will be going! Don’t even try to turn back until you hear me going out of the cafe. Otherwise, everyone here is as good as DEAD!♡

_________________________________

LRC Mirio: After the mysterious girl left the cafe, I called the police to search the areas to look for her. But she was nowhere to be found.

My father came, half freaked out. He was scared to death thinking something bad might happened to me. He said he was sorry over and over again.

I was disappointed at myself, failing to catch the villain only a few inches away. But on the other hand, I was just glad no one was hurt despite a real villain was there.

Oh, by the way… I didn’t answer the question yet, right?
One word would describe her.

“Psycho”.

summary: Got a request for bnha boys in dresses, and I’m weak for boys in dresses so OFC I’m gonna do that! I have a very soft spot for...
caption: Got a request for bnha boys in dresses, and I’m weak for boys in dresses so OFC I’m gonna do that! I have a very soft spot for green and I really wanted to draw Izuku in a dress. Thank you @tardii-art for the request!

reblog.comment: Got a request for bnha boys in dresses, and I’m weak for boys in dresses so OFC I’m gonna do that! I have a very soft spot for green and I really wanted to draw Izuku in a dress. Thank you @tardii-art for the request!
